name: The End of Days
description:
Controls: Left/right arrow keys to move, shift to sprint! R is to restart game in case you're stuck!

Objective: Get to the end of each level. (Preferably without dying more than twice, else you lose ^_^)

Story: In the year 3027, as global warming reaches its tipping point, many natural disasters become a common occurrence similar to what happened 65 million years ago during the extinction of the dinosaurs. As hurricanes rage on, volcanoes erupt and new diseases cause mutations in earth's wildlife. This is why it is imperative for you to get to a bunker in order to last the... END OF DAYS!!!
